name: OffRoad 4x4 Jeep Mountain Climb Driving Simulator
name_original: OffRoad 4x4 Jeep Mountain Climb Driving Simulator
description:
Do you love offroading games with jeep? Welcome to New Offroad Jeep Drive 3D game and become a Extreme jeep hill climb driver of 2017. Jeep Hill climbing is a free offline off Road Mountain Simulation game that is a addictive and fun 3D game dedicated to all the fans who love jeep driving games! it's time for extreme driving adventure in Hills & Mountains by Climbing both uphill and downhill to reach to the challenging Check Points on Off-Roads. You will get the real offroad simulator 4x4 SUV experience.

By follow the guiding arrow to the parking spots, you have to park the jeep in each marked space without getting into any accidents with obstacles. If you hit other sport cars, prados or or any other type of SUV vehicle your chance of winning the level will decrease. For accuracy make use of different camera angles for Jeep parking. In order to score all stars, you must drive absolutely perfect with precision. Prove that you're the best driver in the town!

Enjoy the 2017 bumpy ride with 4x4 Extreme Jeep Driving 3D
